scripts.sf:e2e:open:smoke: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run storefront:serve-prod" "wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001 && npx nx run storefront-e2e:e2e:smoke"
scripts.sf:e2e:headless:smoke: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run storefront:serve-prod" "wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001 && npx nx run storefront-e2e:e2e:headless-smoke"
scripts.sf:e2e:headless:ci:smoke: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run storefront:serve-prod" "wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001 && npx nx run storefront-e2e:e2e:headless-ci-smoke"
scripts.sf:e2e:open: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run storefront:serve-e2e" "wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001 && npx nx run storefront-e2e:e2e"
scripts.sf:e2e:headless: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run storefront:serve-e2e" "wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001 && npx nx run storefront-e2e:e2e:headless"
scripts.sf:e2e:headless:ci: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run storefront:serve-e2e" "wait-on -v -i=2000 http://localhost:3001 && npx nx run storefront-e2e:e2e:headless-ci"
scripts.sf:e2e:headless:ci:affected: npx nx print-affected --select=projects | grep -E -v 'storefront' && echo 'nothing changed, skip' || npm run sf:e2e:headless:ci
scripts.fa:serve: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run fulfillment:serve" "npx nx run fulfillment:mock"
scripts.fa:serve:ci: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npx nx run fulfillment:build && npx nx run fulfillment:preview" "npx nx run fulfillment:mock"
scripts.fa:wait-on: wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001/picking-lists && wait-on -i=2000 -c wait-on-config.json http-get://localhost:4200 && wait-on -i=2000 -t=60000 -v apps/fulfillment/dev-dist/sw/main.js
scripts.fa:wait-on:ci: wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001/picking-lists && wait-on -i=2000 -c wait-on-config.json http-get://localhost:4173 && wait-on -i=2000 -t=60000 -v apps/fulfillment/dev-dist/sw/main.js
scripts.fa:e2e:open: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run fa:serve" "npm run fa:wait-on && npx nx run fulfillment-e2e:e2e"
scripts.fa:e2e:headless: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run fa:serve" "npm run fa:wait-on && npx nx run fulfillment-e2e:e2e:headless"
scripts.fa:e2e:headless:ci: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run fa:serve:ci" "npm run fa:wait-on:ci && npx nx run fulfillment-e2e:e2e:headless-ci"
scripts.fa:e2e:headless:ci:affected: npx nx print-affected --select=projects | grep -E -v 'fulfillment' && echo 'nothing changed, skip' || npm run fa:e2e:headless:ci
scripts.testfront:e2e: npx concurrently --kill-others --success first "cd apps/testfront && npm run prod:ssr" "wait-on -i=2000 http://localhost:3001 && npm run release-test:e2e "
